name: Get Microsoft CASB Alert Information
description: Fetches details related to Microsoft cloud access security broker(CASB) alert and extracts indicators from alert activity(s). This is reference playbook to Pickup and Enrich Microsoft CASB Alert

step_variables.fileURL: {% if vars.result.data.alternateLink | length > 0%}{{vars.result.data.alternateLink}}{% else %}{{vars.steps.Fetch_Activities_Related_to_Alert.data.data | json_query("[? rawDataJson.Operation == 'FileUploaded' ].rawDataJson.ObjectId") | join('')}}{% endif %}

arguments.mcasAlertDetails:
Alert ID: {{vars.mcasAlertID}}
Alert Country:{{vars.mcasAlertCountry}}

User Details:
User Display Name: {{vars.userDisplayName or 'NA'}}
User Domain: {{vars.userDomain or 'NA'}}
User Email ID: {{vars.userEmailID or 'NA'}}

File Details:
File Name: {{vars.fileName or 'NA'}}
File Path: {{vars.filePath or 'NA'}}
File URL: {{vars.fileURL or 'NA'}}

routes.name: Fetch Alert Details -> Get Alert Activity Details
Fetch Activities Related to Alert -> Get User Details
Fetch Alert User Details -> Fetch File Details
Fetch File Details -> Extract Indicators from Alert Activity
Extract Indicators from Alert Activity -> Create and link indicator
Create and link indicator -> Update Alert Details
